login.prompt: Log in to start using the reporting tool!

resetPassword.title: Change password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter a new password and press "save"
resetPassword.success: You have successfully reset your password!
resetPassword.missingPassword: You must enter a new password
resetPassword.reresetError: Failed to request a new reset link: {{message}}
resetPassword.reresetSuccess: A password reset email was sent to {{email}}. Please check your email and follow those instructions.

errors.MISSING_TOKEN: You are missing a valid token. Please request a new reset link and try again.
errors.VALIDATION_ERROR: There was an error validating your request. Please request a new link and try again.
errors.RESET_PASSWORD_BAD_TOKEN: Your reset token was invalid. Please request a new link and try again.
errors.REGISTER_INVALID_PASSWORD: The new password you chose is not strong enough. Please enter a longer password.

verify.successDetail: You are being redirected to the home page.
verify.reverifySuccess: Sent a new verification link to {{email}}.
verify.reverifyError: Failed to request a new verification link: {{message}}
verify.error: An error occurred verifying your email.

errors.VALIDATION_ERROR: The given token couldn't be verified. Please request a new link and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_TOKEN_EXPIRED: This token has already expired. Please request a new link and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_BAD_TOKEN: This token is invalid. Please request a new link and try again.
errors.VERIFY_USER_ALREADY_VERIFIED: Your email has already been verified.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: We're not sure what went wrong. Please request a new link and try to verify your account again. If that doesn't work, contact someone in charge.
errors.MISSING_TOKEN: Your verification token is missing. Please request a new link and try again.
